properties.body:
NORTH AND SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL.
1. INTERNATIONAL EXERCISE OF NAVAL CONTROL OF MARITIME
   TRAFFIC (CNTM) BRASIL TRAM 24 THRU 29 JUN.
   THE PRESENT INSTRUCTIONS APPLY TO ALL NATIONAL
   AND FOREIGN MERCHANT VESSELS, THAT IN THE PERIOD
   251100Z TO 291500Z JUN, VOLUNTEER TO PARTICIPATE
   IN THE MENTIONED EXERCISE OF NAVAL CONTROL OF
   MARITIME TRAFFIC AND ARE IN THE FOLLOWING SITUATIONS:
   A. IN TRANSIT, ENTERING AREA OF SAR EXERCISE.
   B. IN TRANSIT, INSIDE AREA OF EXERCISE, SEEKING
      A BRAZILIAN OR FOREIGN PORT.
   C. MOORED AT A BRAZILIAN PORT AND ESTIMATED TO
      LEAVE DURING PERIOD OF EXERCISE.
2. THE INFORMATION CONTAINED IN FORM FORMAT ALFA SHOULD
   BE TRANSMITTED, BY E-MAIL TO COMCONTRAM WITH COPY TO
   COMANDO DO DISTRITO NAVAL OF MARITIME AREA WHERE THE
   MERCHANT SHIP IS, WHENEVER THE SHIP IS UNDER ONE OF
   THE THREE SITUATIONS DESCRIBED ABOVE. THE FORMAT ALFA
   FORM IS AVAILABLE AT WWW.COMCONTRAM.MAR.MIL.BR.
   WHERE THE INTERESTED SHIP CAN OBTAIN IT THROUGH LINK
   EXERCICIO CNTM/BRASILTRAM/FORMAT ALFA IN PORTUGUESE
   AND ENGLISH LANGUAGES. THIS FORM MAY ALSO BE PROVIDED
   BY REPRESENTATIVES OF MILITARY ORGANIZATIONS INVOLVED IN
   THE EXERCISE TO THE MASTERS OF MERCHANT SHIPS AT BERTH.
3. NORTH MARITIME AREA - REPRESENTED BY COMMAND OF NAVAL
   DISTRICT 4 OCA NORTH IN BELEM, IN AREA BOUND BY
   04-30N 051-38W, 08-35N 048-00W, 10-00N 048-00W,
   10-00N 036-56W, 03-01S 041-14W.
   PHONE: 91 3216 4030, FAX: 91 3241 4700,
   E-MAIL: CNTM@4DN.MAR.MIL.BR.
4. NORTHEAST MARITIME AREA - REPRESENTED BY COMMAND OF NAVAL
   DISTRICT 3 OCA NORTHEAST IN NATAL, IN AREA BOUND BY
   03-01S 041-14W, 10-00N 036-56W, 10-00N 036-00W,
   07-40N 035-00W, 06-22S 016-00W, 06-22S 010-00W,
   19-43S 010-00W, 10-30S 036-25W.
   PHONE: 84 3216 3038, FAX: 84 3216 3057,
   E-MAIL: CNTM@3DN.MAR.MIL.BR.
5. EAST MARITIME AREA - REPRESENTED BY COMMAND OF NAVAL
   DISTRICT 2 OCA EAST IN SALVADOR, IN AREA BOUND BY
   10-30S 036-25W, 19-43S 010-00W, 27-45S 010-00W,
   22-30S 026-49W, 20-40S 032-31W, 18-21S 039-40W.
   PHONE: 71 3507 3725, FAX: 71 3507 3772,
   E-MAIL: CNTM@2DN.MAR.MIL.BR.
6. SOUTHEAST MARITIME AREA - REPRESENTED BY COMMAND OF NAVAL
   DISTRICT 1 OCA SOUTHEAST IN RIO DE JANEIRO:
   A. IN AREA BOUND BY
      18-21S 039-40W, 20-40S 032-31W, 22-30S 026-49W,
      27-45S 010-00W, 34-00S 010-00W, 34-00S 036-02W,
      25-14S 048-01W.
   B. WITHIN 200 MILES OF ILHA DA TRINIDADE (20-31S 029-19W).
   PHONE: 21 2104 6035, FAX: 21 2104 6196,
   E-MAIL: CNTM@1DN.MAR.MIL.BR.
7. SOUTH MARITIME AREA - REPRESENTED BY COMMAND OF NAVAL
   DISTRICT 5 SOUTH OCA IN RIO GRANDE, IN AREA BOUND BY
   25-14S 048-01W, 34-00S 036-02W, 34-00S 048-27W,
   35-50S 050-10W, 33-44S 053-22W.
   PHONE: 53 3233 6130, FAX: 53 3231 1519,
   E-MAIL: CNTM@5DN.MAR.MIL.BR.
8. NAVAL COMMAND CONTROL OF MARITIME TRAFFIC (COMCONTRAM)
   PHONE: 21 2104 6351, 21 2104 6353, 21 2104 6347,
   FAX: 21 2104 6341, E-MAIL: CNTM@COTRAM.MAR.MIL.BR
   OR CONTROLE@COTRAM.MAR.MIL.BR.
9. CANCEL THIS MSG 30 JUN.
